trans-unit.source: Provides <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement"></xref> objects for each state of a tab control that shares its bottom, left, and right borders with other tab controls.

Each property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.Tab.TopTabItem> class returns a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement> for a different state of a tab control that shares its bottom, left, and right borders with other tab controls.
Gets a visual style element that represents a disabled tab control that shares its bottom, left, and right borders with other tab controls.

You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement> returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.Tab.TopTabItem.Disabled%2A> property to create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer>.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement"></xref> that represents a disabled tab control that shares its bottom, left, and right borders with other tab controls.
Gets a visual style element that represents a hot tab control that shares its bottom, left, and right borders with other tab controls.

You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement> returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.Tab.TopTabItem.Hot%2A> property to create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer>.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement"></xref> that represents a hot tab control that shares its bottom, left, and right borders with other tab controls.
Gets a visual style element that represents a normal tab control that shares its bottom, left, and right borders with other tab controls.

You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement> returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.Tab.TopTabItem.Normal%2A> property to create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer>.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement"></xref> that represents a normal tab control that shares its bottom, left, and right borders with other tab controls.
Gets a visual style element that represents a pressed tab control that shares its bottom, left, and right borders with other tab controls.

You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement> returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.Tab.TopTabItem.Pressed%2A> property to create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer>.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement"></xref> that represents a pressed tab control that shares its bottom, left, and right borders with other tab controls.
